In today’s hyper-connected digital landscape, the evolution of technology has brought about both opportunities and challenges. With the proliferation of devices and the exponential growth of data, ensuring robust network security has become a critical concern for individuals, businesses, and industries worldwide. Among the myriad tools available to fortify network security, the role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in network security emerges as a pivotal game-changer. AI presents multifaceted solutions, spanning from fraud detection to enhancing telecom infrastructure through edge computing, significantly shaping the landscape of AI in network security.

Within the ever-shifting terrain of cybersecurity, safeguarding sensitive information and infrastructure is paramount, and network security serves as its foundational bastion. Artificial Intelligence (AI) has emerged as a formidable ally in strengthening network security, offering sophisticated tools and capabilities to swiftly and accurately detect, prevent, and counter cyber threats, thereby fortifying defenses against evolving dangers.

AI-powered systems leverage machine learning algorithms to analyze vast amounts of data in real-time. This analysis helps identify patterns, anomalies, and potential threats that traditional rule-based systems might miss. AI systems, drawing from history, adapt to new threats to detect and prevent cyber-attacks proactively, averting significant damage.

AI’s strength lies in its ability to discern normal patterns of behavior within a network. By continuously analyzing network activities and user behaviors, AI can detect deviations that signal potential security breaches. Behavioral analytics powered by AI assist in distinguishing between legitimate user actions and malicious intent, enabling swift responses to mitigate risks.

One of AI’s primary advantages in network security is its capacity for rapid response and adaptation. These systems can autonomously respond to security incidents in real-time. By employing predictive analysis and predefined response protocols, AI can contain threats, minimizing their impact while continuously evolving to counter new and emerging threats effectively.

AI-driven cybersecurity tools excel in identifying sophisticated threats such as zero-day attacks, polymorphic malware, and advanced persistent threats (APTs). Through deep learning techniques, AI systems can analyze complex data structures like network traffic and system logs, uncovering subtle indicators of potential threats that evade traditional security measures.

AI automation streamlines routine security tasks, enabling cybersecurity professionals to focus on strategic initiatives. Automated processes in threat detection, incident response, and vulnerability management significantly enhance efficiency and reduce response times, which is crucial in the rapidly evolving threat landscape.

As cyber threats continue to evolve in complexity and frequency, the integration of AI in network security remains pivotal. The ongoing advancements in AI technologies, including machine learning, deep learning, and neural networks, promise further innovations in fortifying network defenses and ensuring the resilience of critical infrastructure.

AI’s role in network security will continue to evolve, offering enhanced capabilities in threat detection, incident response, and predictive analytics. Adapting AI-driven solutions will be essential for organizations seeking robust defenses against the ever-adapting landscape of cyber threats, ensuring the protection of valuable data and infrastructure in an increasingly interconnected digital world.

Telecommunication networks face the challenge of handling vast amounts of data while ensuring low latency and high-speed connectivity. AI’s integration with edge computing has emerged as a transformative solution, revolutionizing telecom infrastructure in the following ways:

Telecom operators can optimize network performance by deploying AI algorithms at the network edge. AI-driven analytics predict network congestion, dynamically allocate resources, and optimize bandwidth, ensuring seamless connectivity even in high-demand scenarios.

With AI, Edge computing enables real-time data analysis closer to the source, reducing latency significantly. This is crucial for applications like autonomous vehicles, IoT devices, and smart cities that require instantaneous decision-making capabilities.

AI-integrated edge devices can bolster security by detecting and mitigating threats at the network’s edge. These systems can identify anomalies in network traffic, secure endpoints, and prevent potential breaches, enhancing overall network security.

Therefore, combining Artificial Intelligence with network security and telecom infrastructure has heralded a new era of proactive defense mechanisms and optimized performance. AI’s ability to learn, adapt, and respond in real-time empowers industries to stay ahead in the ongoing battle against cyber threats. Furthermore, its integration with edge computing not only fortifies network security but also lays the foundation for a more efficient, responsive, and interconnected digital ecosystem.

As technology continues to evolve, the utilization of AI in network security will remain pivotal in safeguarding sensitive information, maintaining robust infrastructure, and enabling the seamless operation of the interconnected world we live in. Embracing the power of AI in network security is not merely an option; it’s a necessity in the digital age.

In today’s competitive job market, LinkedIn stands out as a powerful ally for professionals and students. Often misconceived as solely a platform for seasoned professionals, LinkedIn is equally beneficial for students in paving their way toward successful career paths. Remarkably, data reveals that 98% of recruiters and 85% of hiring managers actively utilize LinkedIn as their primary tool for identifying and engaging potential candidates. Therefore,  leveraging the power of LinkedIn can significantly boost your chances of landing your dream job. Hence, in this blog, you can discover how you can make your LinkedIn profile better and transform your profile presence into a powerful asset for career advancement for both, professionals and students!

LinkedIn serves as a dynamic platform connecting millions of professionals worldwide, offering invaluable resources for job seekers. Through its extensive network, users can explore job listings, connect with recruiters, and gain insights for career advancement.

Additionally, LinkedIn allows individuals to showcase their expertise, skills, and accomplishments, serving as a virtual resume that can attract potential employers. Therefore, optimizing your profile is crucial in making a lasting impression and increasing your visibility to recruiters and hiring managers. To empower your profile and amplify its impact within this expansive platform, here are ten strategic tips curated to elevate your LinkedIn presence and open doors to new professional horizons.

Select a professional and clear profile picture where your face is easily visible. A high-quality image with appropriate attire and a friendly yet professional demeanor can create a positive first impression.
Showcase your educational background, certifications, courses, and any academic achievements. This gives visitors a quick overview of your qualifications and expertise.
Describe your work experiences, internships, and any significant projects undertaken. Emphasize key responsibilities, achievements, and skills gained during these roles.
Utilize the skills section to list your competencies. Incorporate industry-related keywords and relevant abilities to increase visibility and showcase your expertise.

Developing a strong personal brand is integral to career progression. LinkedIn serves as an ideal platform to cultivate a compelling professional brand. By sharing relevant content, contributing to discussions, and showcasing expertise, individuals can solidify their reputation as industry leaders.
Connect with colleagues, classmates, mentors, and professionals from your field. Expanding your network broadens opportunities for collaboration, knowledge sharing, and potential job prospects.
Personalize connection requests when reaching out to professionals. Explain your intent behind the connection and how you may be able to mutually benefit from the connection.

Incorporate industry-specific keywords throughout your profile, including in your headline, summary, experience descriptions, and skill section. This optimization helps improve your profile’s visibility in searches.

Actively engage with recruiters and HR professionals in your field. Building relationships with them can increase your visibility for job opportunities and keep you informed about industry trends and openings.
Join industry-related groups and participate in discussions. Sharing insightful content or engaging in discussions can demonstrate your expertise and expand your network.

Regularly update your profile with new skills, experiences, achievements, and any professional development activities. Engage with connections and stay current with industry news and trends by sharing and interacting with relevant content.

It is essential to enhance your LinkedIn profile, a necessity not only for professionals but also for students seeking to chart a successful career path. Acknowledging this importance, our students at Sunway College Kathmandu diligently follow the steps outlined below, aligning themselves with various initiatives aimed at refining their LinkedIn profiles.

These proactive efforts are designed to enhance their prospects of securing desirable job placements. Likewise, before diving into the steps on how to make your LinkedIn profile better, let’s explore how students at Sunway College Kathmandu leverage their LinkedIn profiles through impactful activities.

Eager to develop a genuine passion for Python programming? If that’s the case, prepare for an exciting journey as we discover the best Python courses in Nepal. In the field of tech education, Python has surged in popularity as a programming language, becoming the go-to choice for various applications such as data analysis, machine learning, web development, and more. Python, a high-level programming language course renowned for its simplicity and adaptability, has garnered significant traction in Nepal across diverse industries. Its user-friendly nature, clear syntax, and robust functionalities make it an ideal choice for both novices and seasoned professionals in the country’s tech landscape.

Python, revered for its versatility and ease of use, has garnered a wide spectrum of admirers ranging from beginners to seasoned developers. Its robustness, coupled with user-friendliness, has established it as a go-to language in the programming world. Python’s extensive library ecosystem empowers developers to craft sophisticated applications, making it a cornerstone in the tech world.

What truly distinguishes Python is its dynamic, object-oriented nature, which enables the creation of clean and efficient code. Its emphasis on logical structure and readability fosters an engaging programming experience, encouraging exploration and experimentation. This inherent simplicity of Python not only invites but also brings up creativity, making it a preferred choice for developers worldwide.

Several key factors underpin Python’s popularity within the developers’ community. First and foremost is its innate simplicity and readability. Python’s syntax closely resembles natural language, making it highly approachable for both beginners and seasoned developers. Its ease of comprehension reduces coding time and minimizes debugging efforts, attracting a broad spectrum of programmers.

Another pivotal aspect contributing to Python’s appeal is its versatility and flexibility. This language finds extensive applications across diverse domains such as web development, data analysis, scientific computing, artificial intelligence, and more. Its adaptability in handling varied tasks without significant code alterations makes it an indispensable tool for developers across industries.

The wealth of libraries and frameworks available in Python plays a significant role in its widespread adoption. With packages like NumPy, Pandas, TensorFlow, Django, and others, developers benefit from ready-to-use tools that significantly expedite the development process. These libraries serve as robust foundations for various applications, contributing to Python’s allure.

Python’s vibrant and expansive community is another contributing factor to its popularity. The active global community continuously contributes to the language’s growth by sharing knowledge, providing support through forums, and creating an array of resources like tutorials, documentation, and open-source projects. This collaborative environment fosters learning and innovation, attracting developers to engage and contribute.

Moreover, Python’s dominance in data science and machine learning further propels its popularity. Its user-friendly nature, coupled with libraries such as SciPy, sci-kit-learn, and Keras, positions Python as the preferred choice for data-related tasks and AI development.

Lastly, Python proficiency holds substantial value in the job market, offering abundant career opportunities. Its widespread adoption across industries highlights its efficiency, versatility, and relevance, making it an attractive skill set for employers seeking adaptable and proficient developers.

Choosing Sunway College Kathmandu for your Python journey offers a host of exclusive advantages that set us apart. Our courses, such as the “BSc (Hons) Computer Science with Artificial Intelligence” affiliated with Birmingham City University, UK, and the “Data Analysis with Python” short course affiliated with NCC Education, UK, provide global recognition. Aligned with international benchmarks, these affiliations ensure that our curriculum meets high standards, granting students a competitive edge in the job market.

Moreover, we acknowledge the significance of not just acquiring Python skills but leveraging them for career advancement. Hence, our courses include dedicated career guidance sessions. These sessions assist students in exploring various career paths and opportunities within Python programming and data analysis, fostering holistic growth.

At Sunway College Kathmandu, our courses are facilitated by seasoned trainers possessing comprehensive theoretical knowledge and practical industry experience. Through personalized guidance and mentorship, students gain a deep understanding of Python concepts, enhancing their proficiency effectively.

Our specialized curriculum spans a wide spectrum of Python programming, covering fundamental concepts to advanced data analysis techniques. Students explore topics such as data visualization, statistical analysis, and more, empowering them to apply Python in real-world scenarios competently.

The courses encompass an extensive range of topics, including but not limited to Introduction to Python, Control Structures, Functions and Modules, Data Structures, Numpy and Pandas for Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), Statistical Analysis, Computer Programming, and Natural Language Processing. This comprehensive coverage ensures a well-rounded learning experience tailored to equip students with in-demand skills and expertise in Python programming and data analysis.

The integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in various sectors worldwide has become a focal point of modern technological advancements and scholarly discussions. In Nepal, while AI adoption is still in its developing stages compared to the global landscape, its emergence signifies a growing part of daily life in the country. Understanding the basics of AI and its applications in Nepal is essential in grasping its evolving role within the nation.

Nepal, renowned for its stunning landscapes and rich cultural heritage, is at the forefront of transformative technological advancements, particularly in Artificial Intelligence (AI). This central shift presents a landscape with opportunities and challenges that hold the potential to significantly shape the country’s trajectory.

AI, often acclaimed as the ‘Fourth Industrial Revolution,’ is swiftly spreading diverse sectors in Nepal, spanning from agriculture, healthcare, and education to finance. This technological wave is unlocking extraordinary potential, moving the nation toward a more technology-driven future.

Agriculture, the backbone of Nepal’s economy, is undergoing a revolution driven by AI adoption. AI tools aid in crop management, pest control, and resource optimization. Predictive analytics powered by AI enable informed decisions on planting cycles, weather forecasts, and soil quality, enhancing productivity and sustainability. This technology transforms farming practices, offering proactive solutions, reducing reliance on pesticides, and optimizing resource usage. It empowers farmers with predictive insights, reshaping traditional methods and contributing to economic growth in Nepal.

In remote regions of Nepal, AI has become a pivotal tool in transforming healthcare accessibility. Through AI-powered telemedicine platforms, individuals in these distant areas can now receive diagnostic evaluations and consultations without the need to travel long distances. This advancement ensures that medical expertise is readily available and accessible to those who might otherwise struggle due to geographical constraints.

Moreover, AI plays a significant role beyond immediate consultations. It contributes extensively to predicting diseases, discovering new drugs, and shaping personalized treatment plans for patients. These applications of AI technology have sparked a revolution in Nepal’s healthcare sector, enabling earlier detection of illnesses, more effective drug development, and the customization of treatment approaches based on individual patient needs. This transformative impact is gradually improving healthcare outcomes and narrowing the gap in medical services between remote regions and urban centers in Nepal.

In Nepal’s education system, the integration of AI technology has significantly transformed the traditional learning experience. Through the utilization of AI-powered adaptive learning platforms, students now have access to customized educational resources and tools. These platforms utilize sophisticated algorithms to analyze individual learning patterns and preferences, eventually providing personalized content and assessments that align with each student’s needs.

The primary goal of this innovative approach is to enhance learning outcomes by catering to the specific requirements of each learner. By delivering tailored educational materials, these AI-driven systems aim to address the diverse learning styles and paces of students, thereby fostering a more effective and engaging learning environment.

Moreover, the integration of AI in education in Nepal seeks to democratize access to quality education. By leveraging technology, these platforms can potentially reach remote areas and underserved communities, thereby bridging the gap in educational disparities and providing more equitable opportunities for learning.

Overall, the infusion of AI in Nepal’s educational landscape represents a promising shift towards personalized and inclusive learning methodologies that strive to optimize learning experiences and improve educational outcomes for students across the country.

AI is significantly reshaping various industries and playing a crucial role in boosting economic prospects within Nepal. Both appearing startups such as Fusemachines Nepal and established companies like Paaila Technology are actively delving into AI-driven solutions. Their focus on innovative AI applications not only fuels creativity but also propels economic expansion.

This flow in technological advancements isn’t just limited to innovation; it’s creating job avenues and drawing substantial investments into Nepal’s rapidly growing tech landscape. As AI continues to evolve, it’s fostering an environment ripe for economic growth, presenting opportunities for employment, and encouraging investors to participate in Nepal’s burgeoning tech industry.

Nepal’s adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) is on the rise, although it mainly utilizes what’s termed as “weak AI,” exemplified by applications such as Siri and Google Assistant found on smartphones. These technologies demonstrate basic AI functionalities and are widely used within the country.

However, Nepal is undergoing a transformation in its approach to AI. There’s a noticeable shift, with educational institutions introducing specialized courses in AI, providing to the growing interest and demand for expertise in this field. Moreover, there are pioneering AI companies in Nepal that are spearheading initiatives and advancements in AI development. These companies are playing a pivotal role in driving innovation and progress in the world of artificial intelligence within the country.

The gradual integration of AI-focused educational programs and the presence of leading AI companies signify Nepal’s increasing commitment to advancing AI technologies. This evolution suggests a growing recognition of the importance of AI and its potential impact on various sectors within Nepal, indicating a promising future for AI development and application in the country.

Yet, Nepal encounters difficulties in effectively overseeing the use of AI technology. The absence of thorough rules and regulations raises ethical issues, particularly regarding the protection of data, biases within algorithms, and unequal access to digital resources. Despite the promising vision outlined in Nepal’s Digital Nepal Framework, it lacks in-depth consideration regarding ethical aspects of AI. This deficiency highlights the urgent need for legislative reforms that can govern the deployment of AI more efficiently and ethically in the country.

Promoting AI usage in Nepal demands comprehensive regulations aligned with ethical considerations. Educating people about AI ethics is critical to reduce risks associated with unregulated AI adoption. Balancing technological advancement with ethical practices is crucial for AI to benefit society without compromising individual rights or creating discriminatory biases.

To sum it up, Nepal stands at a crossroads in its AI evolution, requiring proactive measures to harness AI’s potential while safeguarding ethical principles and individual rights. Striking a balance between technological innovation and ethical governance is pivotal for Nepal’s sustainable development and societal well-being in the AI-driven future.

Furthermore, in Nepal, the rise of Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping various sectors, creating a demand for skilled professionals in this field. At Sunway College Kathmandu, with a motto of creating future AI leaders, we understand the significance of AI in today’s world and offer advanced courses to meet the demands of this rapidly evolving industry.

In today’s world, we are witnessing an unprecedented surge in data generation. This data serves as the lifeblood for businesses, fueling their growth and development. However, this data is often unstructured and stored in the cloud, necessitating the expertise of data scientists to process and harness it into a valuable asset. The extensive influence of data-driven technology is reshaping not only our daily lives but also businesses, a transformation that has accelerated over the past decade.

Data science, with its primary objective of searching deep into data to display hidden potentials and deliver tangible value, has become an integral component of businesses across all sectors. The unyielding demand for data analysis has established a unique niche for data scientists in the business landscape.

In this blog, you will learn the importance and scope of data science. Likewise, we will discuss the data scientist’s future scope to help you reach higher-paying positions in the industry. Moreover, this blog will uncover the scope of data science in Nepal and answer why data science is a good career option.

Data Science is more than one academic field that combines techniques from statistics, computer science, and domain knowledge to extract valuable insights and knowledge from data. It involves collecting, processing, and analyzing data to uncover patterns, trends, and information that can be used to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive business strategies. Data scientists use various tools and techniques, including data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization, to transform raw data into actionable knowledge.
Data science is undeniably one of the most promising career choices in the world today. Several compelling reasons make this profession highly attractive:

As data science technology rapidly advances, and data’s value continues to soar, data science remains among the most sought-after professions. Data scientists play a pivotal role in comprehending, interpreting, and leveraging data for informed decision-making across various sectors, including businesses, government departments, and organizations.

The significance of a data scientist’s role is set to further escalate as data assumes greater importance for businesses. As data grows larger, more complex, and increasingly accessible through powerful big data analytics tools, the demand for data scientists will only intensify. This points toward an expanding data science scope in the future, solidifying its status as an exceptionally lucrative career option.

For those aspiring to establish a data science career, a firm grasp of data science tools and technologies is essential. The ability to interpret data, develop data models, and construct data analytics solutions is essential. Additionally, strong problem-solving skills, effective communication, and a drive to unearth insights from data are highly valuable.

Therefore, data science is an excellent career choice for individuals looking to make a tangible impact through data-driven decision-making. Given the ever-expanding data science future scope, it is a worthwhile career path for those interested in the data field. Moreover, data science roles typically offer competitive remuneration and exciting opportunities, making it a highly rewarding choice for those who pursue this path.

The future of Data Science is dynamic, evolving with the new technologies and tools. In the coming decade, it’s set to grow, with enough job opportunities for data scientists. This strong outlook is driven by the ever-expanding data landscape and industry demand.
Likewise, below are some stats that enlighten us about the acclaimed future of data science:
Therefore, the future of data science looks exceptionally bright, offering a wealth of opportunities and a promising career landscape for aspiring professionals.

In recent years, the scope of data science has witnessed a significant upsurge in Nepal, making it an attractive career choice for the country’s youth. In this blog, we will delve into the reasons why the field of data science is a compelling career choice in Nepal.

One of the primary factors driving the demand for data science professionals in Nepal is the increasing reliance on data-driven decision-making across various industries. From healthcare and finance to e-commerce and agriculture, organizations are realizing the immense value of data in gaining a competitive edge. This shift has created a significant demand for data scientists who can extract insights and help organizations make informed decisions.

Data science is a versatile field that can be applied to a wide range of industries and domains. In Nepal, this versatility is particularly advantageous as it allows data scientists to work in various sectors, from agriculture and tourism to disaster management and public health. The ability to adapt and apply data science methodologies to different sectors makes it an appealing career choice for those seeking diverse and exciting opportunities.

Nepal faces unique social and environmental challenges, and data science can play a pivotal role in addressing these issues. Data-driven solutions can be used to improve public health, disaster preparedness, agriculture, and environmental conservation in Nepal. This potential for positive social impact makes data science a meaningful career choice for individuals who want to contribute to the betterment of their country.

The education sector in Nepal has been quick to recognize the growing importance of data science. Several universities and institutions in Nepal now offer data science programs, which provide aspiring professionals with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in this field. These educational opportunities make it easier for Nepali students to pursue a career in data science without having to travel abroad.

One of the advantages of a career in data science is the ability to work remotely and connect with global clients and employers. This not only offers flexibility but also opens up the possibility of working for international companies while staying in Nepal. As the world increasingly shifts towards remote work, data science professionals can tap into global job markets without leaving their homeland.

The demand for data scientists in Nepal has led to competitive salaries, making it a lucrative career choice. Data science professionals in Nepal can earn a respectable income, often on par with or even exceeding the salaries in traditional professions. This financial stability is a significant draw for many young professionals.

As the country continues to cherish the digital age, the future for data science professionals in Nepal looks bright, and those who take up this career path are likely to find exciting opportunities and a chance to make a meaningful impact on their society and beyond.

Starting a data science career in today’s digital era is an exciting and fulfilling opportunity. Whether you are starting from scratch or seeking to enhance your skills, now is the ideal moment to take that crucial first step into this dynamic field. By mastering the complexity of data science, you open the door to a world of possibilities and the chance to contribute to groundbreaking innovations across diverse industries.

The AI revolution is sweeping the world, and Nepal is no exception. As artificial intelligence continues to reshape industries and create new opportunities, the demand for skilled AI professionals in Nepal is skyrocketing. These professionals are at the forefront of innovation and enjoy some of the most attractive salaries in the job market. In this blog, we’ll explore some of the highest-paying AI jobs in Nepal, shedding light on the lucrative opportunities that await talented individuals in this dynamic field.

AI’s impact on Nepal’s job market cannot be underestimated. It is both transforming existing roles and ushering in entirely new career opportunities. To succeed in this field, individuals must acquire advanced skills and knowledge, making it clear that AI is not merely trivial programming. A solid educational background and training are prerequisites, alongside proficiency in computer science and programming.

Without a doubt, AI is synonymous with high-paying jobs. AI professionals are highly sought after in today’s job market, and their salaries reflect the value they bring to the industry. The demand for AI experts has driven up compensation, making AI one of the most financially rewarding career paths in Nepal.
Following are the top high-salary AI jobs in Nepal, attracting talent from all over the country and promising a prosperous future for venturing into the world of artificial intelligence.

Salary in Nepal: Machine Learning Engineers in Nepal can expect to earn between NPR 100,000 to NPR 400,000 per month. For seasoned professionals with substantial experience, the salary can go beyond NPR 600,000.

Machine Learning Engineers play a pivotal role in AI development by creating and implementing machine learning algorithms and models. This task involves training, which is a high processor and computation-intensive aspect of machine learning. Given the complexity of this work, it demands the highest level of skill and training. Most Machine Learning Engineers hold advanced degrees in computer science, mathematics, or statistics. They often pursue further training through certification programs or master’s degrees in areas such as machine learning, deep learning, or neural networks.
Salary in Nepal: Data Scientists in Nepal can earn between NPR 150,000 to NPR 300,000 per month, with experienced professionals commanding higher salaries.

Data Scientists are technology professionals who specialize in collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data to solve problems and drive decision-making within organizations. While not all are programmers, many write their applications. They frequently employ data mining, big data tools, and analytical techniques. Their insights derived from data help businesses improve sales, and operations, make informed decisions, and develop new products and services. Predictive modeling and data visualization are part of their toolkit, with some using machine learning to automate these tasks.
Salary in Nepal: Data Engineers or Architects in Nepal typically earn between NPR 180,000 and NPR 350,000 per month.

Data Engineers work with massive data sets, a fundamental aspect of AI. They are responsible for designing, building, testing, and maintaining complex data processing systems. These professionals typically work with big data tools like Hadoop, Hive, Spark, and Kafka. Advanced degrees in mathematics and statistics are often prerequisites for these roles, as they are crucial for designing, maintaining, and building data pipelines based on extensive data sets.
Salary in Nepal: Software Engineers with AI skills in Nepal can expect monthly earnings ranging from NPR 120,000 to NPR 250,000, depending on experience and expertise.

Software Engineers in the AI domain are responsible for various activities in the software development chain, including design, development, testing, and deployment. AI Software Engineers design, develop, test, and deploy applications related to machine learning, inference, natural language processing (NLP), sensory input, cybersecurity, and intrusion detection.
Salary in Nepal: AI Research Scientists in Nepal can command monthly salaries ranging from NPR 250,000 to NPR 500,000 or more.

AI Research Scientists are computer scientists who specialize in studying and developing new AI algorithms and techniques. Their work involves developing and testing new AI models, collaborating with other researchers, publishing research papers, and presenting findings at conferences. While programming is a component of their work, a significant portion of their role involves research and innovation. AI Research Scientists typically hold graduate degrees and have a strong background in computer science, mathematics, and statistics.

The average salary of an AI professional is subject to various factors that significantly impact earnings. Education, experience, geographic location, industry, and the specific job role all contribute to determining one’s income in this field.

Notably, experience stands out as one of the most influential elements affecting salary levels. The logic is simple: the more experience you accumulate as an AI engineer, the deeper your expertise becomes, and consequently, the higher your earning potential in this dynamic and evolving industry.

AI isn’t merely a good career; it’s a future-proof one. As AI continues to shape the world, the demand for AI professionals will only continue to grow. A career in AI offers high earning potential, job security, and the opportunity to contribute to the future of technology.

In today’s hyper-connected digital landscape, the evolution of technology has brought about both opportunities and challenges. With the proliferation of devices and the exponential growth of data, ensuring robust network security has become a critical concern for individuals, businesses, and industries worldwide. Among the myriad tools available to fortify network security, the role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in network security emerges as a pivotal game-changer. AI presents multifaceted solutions, spanning from fraud detection to enhancing telecom infrastructure through edge computing, significantly shaping the landscape of AI in network security.

Within the ever-shifting terrain of cybersecurity, safeguarding sensitive information and infrastructure is paramount, and network security serves as its foundational bastion. Artificial Intelligence (AI) has emerged as a formidable ally in strengthening network security, offering sophisticated tools and capabilities to swiftly and accurately detect, prevent, and counter cyber threats, thereby fortifying defenses against evolving dangers.

AI-powered systems leverage machine learning algorithms to analyze vast amounts of data in real-time. This analysis helps identify patterns, anomalies, and potential threats that traditional rule-based systems might miss. AI systems, drawing from history, adapt to new threats to detect and prevent cyber-attacks proactively, averting significant damage.

AI’s strength lies in its ability to discern normal patterns of behavior within a network. By continuously analyzing network activities and user behaviors, AI can detect deviations that signal potential security breaches. Behavioral analytics powered by AI assist in distinguishing between legitimate user actions and malicious intent, enabling swift responses to mitigate risks.

One of AI’s primary advantages in network security is its capacity for rapid response and adaptation. These systems can autonomously respond to security incidents in real-time. By employing predictive analysis and predefined response protocols, AI can contain threats, minimizing their impact while continuously evolving to counter new and emerging threats effectively.

AI-driven cybersecurity tools excel in identifying sophisticated threats such as zero-day attacks, polymorphic malware, and advanced persistent threats (APTs). Through deep learning techniques, AI systems can analyze complex data structures like network traffic and system logs, uncovering subtle indicators of potential threats that evade traditional security measures.

AI automation streamlines routine security tasks, enabling cybersecurity professionals to focus on strategic initiatives. Automated processes in threat detection, incident response, and vulnerability management significantly enhance efficiency and reduce response times, which is crucial in the rapidly evolving threat landscape.

As cyber threats continue to evolve in complexity and frequency, the integration of AI in network security remains pivotal. The ongoing advancements in AI technologies, including machine learning, deep learning, and neural networks, promise further innovations in fortifying network defenses and ensuring the resilience of critical infrastructure.

AI’s role in network security will continue to evolve, offering enhanced capabilities in threat detection, incident response, and predictive analytics. Adapting AI-driven solutions will be essential for organizations seeking robust defenses against the ever-adapting landscape of cyber threats, ensuring the protection of valuable data and infrastructure in an increasingly interconnected digital world.

Telecommunication networks face the challenge of handling vast amounts of data while ensuring low latency and high-speed connectivity. AI’s integration with edge computing has emerged as a transformative solution, revolutionizing telecom infrastructure in the following ways:

Telecom operators can optimize network performance by deploying AI algorithms at the network edge. AI-driven analytics predict network congestion, dynamically allocate resources, and optimize bandwidth, ensuring seamless connectivity even in high-demand scenarios.

With AI, Edge computing enables real-time data analysis closer to the source, reducing latency significantly. This is crucial for applications like autonomous vehicles, IoT devices, and smart cities that require instantaneous decision-making capabilities.

AI-integrated edge devices can bolster security by detecting and mitigating threats at the network’s edge. These systems can identify anomalies in network traffic, secure endpoints, and prevent potential breaches, enhancing overall network security.

Therefore, combining Artificial Intelligence with network security and telecom infrastructure has heralded a new era of proactive defense mechanisms and optimized performance. AI’s ability to learn, adapt, and respond in real-time empowers industries to stay ahead in the ongoing battle against cyber threats. Furthermore, its integration with edge computing not only fortifies network security but also lays the foundation for a more efficient, responsive, and interconnected digital ecosystem.

As technology continues to evolve, the utilization of AI in network security will remain pivotal in safeguarding sensitive information, maintaining robust infrastructure, and enabling the seamless operation of the interconnected world we live in. Embracing the power of AI in network security is not merely an option; it’s a necessity in the digital age.

In today’s competitive job market, LinkedIn stands out as a powerful ally for professionals and students. Often misconceived as solely a platform for seasoned professionals, LinkedIn is equally beneficial for students in paving their way toward successful career paths. Remarkably, data reveals that 98% of recruiters and 85% of hiring managers actively utilize LinkedIn as their primary tool for identifying and engaging potential candidates. Therefore,  leveraging the power of LinkedIn can significantly boost your chances of landing your dream job. Hence, in this blog, you can discover how you can make your LinkedIn profile better and transform your profile presence into a powerful asset for career advancement for both, professionals and students!

LinkedIn serves as a dynamic platform connecting millions of professionals worldwide, offering invaluable resources for job seekers. Through its extensive network, users can explore job listings, connect with recruiters, and gain insights for career advancement.

Additionally, LinkedIn allows individuals to showcase their expertise, skills, and accomplishments, serving as a virtual resume that can attract potential employers. Therefore, optimizing your profile is crucial in making a lasting impression and increasing your visibility to recruiters and hiring managers. To empower your profile and amplify its impact within this expansive platform, here are ten strategic tips curated to elevate your LinkedIn presence and open doors to new professional horizons.

Select a professional and clear profile picture where your face is easily visible. A high-quality image with appropriate attire and a friendly yet professional demeanor can create a positive first impression.
Showcase your educational background, certifications, courses, and any academic achievements. This gives visitors a quick overview of your qualifications and expertise.
Describe your work experiences, internships, and any significant projects undertaken. Emphasize key responsibilities, achievements, and skills gained during these roles.
Utilize the skills section to list your competencies. Incorporate industry-related keywords and relevant abilities to increase visibility and showcase your expertise.

Developing a strong personal brand is integral to career progression. LinkedIn serves as an ideal platform to cultivate a compelling professional brand. By sharing relevant content, contributing to discussions, and showcasing expertise, individuals can solidify their reputation as industry leaders.
Connect with colleagues, classmates, mentors, and professionals from your field. Expanding your network broadens opportunities for collaboration, knowledge sharing, and potential job prospects.
Personalize connection requests when reaching out to professionals. Explain your intent behind the connection and how you may be able to mutually benefit from the connection.

Incorporate industry-specific keywords throughout your profile, including in your headline, summary, experience descriptions, and skill section. This optimization helps improve your profile’s visibility in searches.

Actively engage with recruiters and HR professionals in your field. Building relationships with them can increase your visibility for job opportunities and keep you informed about industry trends and openings.
Join industry-related groups and participate in discussions. Sharing insightful content or engaging in discussions can demonstrate your expertise and expand your network.

Regularly update your profile with new skills, experiences, achievements, and any professional development activities. Engage with connections and stay current with industry news and trends by sharing and interacting with relevant content.

It is essential to enhance your LinkedIn profile, a necessity not only for professionals but also for students seeking to chart a successful career path. Acknowledging this importance, our students at Sunway College Kathmandu diligently follow the steps outlined below, aligning themselves with various initiatives aimed at refining their LinkedIn profiles.

These proactive efforts are designed to enhance their prospects of securing desirable job placements. Likewise, before diving into the steps on how to make your LinkedIn profile better, let’s explore how students at Sunway College Kathmandu leverage their LinkedIn profiles through impactful activities.

At Sunway College, we have a dedicated research lab (Sunway College Research Lab) where we focus on experimenting and researching different IoT-based devices. Our mini research is also one of the most loved workplaces for some of our robotic geeks. We provide drones, 3D printers, and other essentials that our students request for their research.  One of our IoT Enthusiast, Sabin Shrestha (and team) have developed an IoT Based Automatic Water Temperature Adjustor.
Let us have an insight into this from Mr. Sabin Shrestha himself.
Hello, I am Sabin Shrestha, a Student at Sunway College Kathmandu (March 2021 Intake). Let’s have a good insight on IoT Based Automatic Water temperature adjustor.

Water heating is part of energy utilization and is a process that is as old as human history. As the mode of water heating is changing from the use of the sun to modern-day electricity. Engineers have now designed and developed a lot of heating water systems. Some of them are geysers, Water heating rods, Solar Water heaters, and many more.
There is much importance of hot water to humankind. This can be a reason why water-heating systems are indispensable and we find them in almost every personal and commercial residences.

In the present time, people are facing many difficulties while using heating systems. Waiting for water to heat is a waste of time. There are many aware difficulties we face such as high electricity consumption, hazardous systems, overheating, no mobile accessibility, and the inability to adjust the temperature.

As our project prototype, we have designed and constructed an automatic water-heating unit. The system is an automatic temperature adjuster that controls a powerful heater in a hot water storage vessel. It has two fixed temperature settings; one is for turning ON the water heater and another is for turning OFF.
Let us rewind the project from its basics.
The rise of IoT (Internet of Things) is one of the most rapid and fascinating advances in information and communications technology.

The term “Internet of Things” (IoT) describes a network of actual physical items that have sensors, software, and other technologies built into them in order to communicate and exchange data with other systems and devices through the internet. The system ‘IoT Based Automatic Water Temperature Adjustor’ is for adjusting water temperature according to the possible surroundings temperature, humidity, and water temperature.

There are several problems with the manual water heater. There’s usually a problem with the high-water temperature. Because of this, most water heaters consume high power and lead to higher electricity bills. We also face a problem by adjusting ourselves to use the device usually at constant water temperature. Considering these problems, we made an IoT Automatic Water Temperature Adjustor.
To operate this system, these are the following tools we used:

The application of this system is very vast as it can be implemented in power plants, hospitals, mountain regions, local homes, dormitories, and lodges. This system is time-saving and cost-efficient, and easy to implement. The tool provides an automatic temperature adjustor, less power consumption, safety, and many more.

An IoT-based automatic water temperature adjustor is better than other systems as it automatically detects and adjusts the water temperature after it senses the environmental temperature. This system is still in its developing phase but was able to show the results accurately.
Now, let’s understand automatic controls and our project.

Automatic control is an enormous term. It covers the control of many variables such as pressure, temperature, flow, level, speed, and many more. In this modern society, there are still a lot of systems that we can make efficient and automatic using IoT.

IoT Based Automatic Water Temperature Adjustor is one of the automatic controlling systems around the world. The difference is that is this system is an automatic water temperature adjustor that adjusts to the temperature and humidity of the atmosphere or environment to which it is applied.

This project falls under the category of Environmental Engineering. This system has the capability of collecting temperature data of both atmosphere and water. For this, the system involves two different sensors for collecting temperature information, one is DHT11 and the other is DS18B20.
We have divided the development process into the following steps:

We researched system usability, understanding of the recently adopted system, project advantages, project scopes, disadvantages, previous system processes, systems requirements, mechanical parts, and problems related to the water temperature adjustor.
In this phase, we developed the system flowchart and the design of the system. After the design, we made the pins which will denote the certain mechanism in the system allocated.

In this phase, we set up the mechanical parts according to the design and assigned the pins accordingly. We utilized Mechanical parts such as Arduino, DHT11, DS18B20, Water Heating Coil, I2C OLED, Resistors, Potentiometers, Bluetooth Module, Jumper wires, Relay, and LED. Finally, we connected all devices to the central device, which is Arduino.

In a technical setup, we downloaded the libraries, and we wrote the code to make the system function automatically. We also uploaded the program for the system in the Arduino so that the system works properly. Now, Through the code, we assigned each individual device the task to be performed. In this phase, we made the soul of the system which makes the system automatic.

In the code, DHT11 Sensor first senses the temperature of the atmosphere and then analyses the temperature of the atmosphere if it is hot or cold. When the temperature is hot the system turns off the heater. When the atmosphere is cold, the system turns on the heater. After the heater is on, the water temperature will increase progressively.

The DS18B20 sensor, a water temperature sensor, also works parallel to sense the temperature of the water. While water is heating, the water temperature analyses the temperature of the water. If the water reaches its preset temperature which is 43 Centigrade, the heater will turn off automatically.

We also set a Bluetooth module to set the range of the water temperature using a mobile application so that the user can manipulate the temperature of the water as needed. The option for the system to turn on or off was also provided in this application. A crucial aspect involved in this step is the maintenance of the code.

In this phase, we collected and analyzed the data. The data is shown in a serial monitor where it is analyzed and compared with the thermometer to check the accuracy.  Tools we used to show the were thermometer, and I2C.

Now, we created a prototype by joining all the hardware components and designing the project’s outlook. The prototype we created is system tested to confirm if the system is working or not. To collect the data, we examined the system in the room to check various aspects of the system, some of which include checking if it is working or not, and even if the provided data is right or not.

IoT-based automatic water temperature adjusts or reads the temperature of any atmosphere to find if the condition of the atmosphere is hot or cold and gives output by adjusting the temperature of the water as required for the user automatically.

As a result, we tested the system for the room where it was made. The result of the room is measured, which mostly lies between 14 degrees centigrade to 20 degrees centigrade in the winter season.  The result shown in Arduino ide’s serial monitor, LCD display, and the water temperature thermometer’s serial monitor is compared.
I would like to express my warm thank you to Sunway College Kathmandu as well as the friends and teachers who helped and encouraged me to complete this project.

Also, I am equally grateful and thankful to Akash Deo and Saddam Hussain of Sunway College Kathmandu. I would also like to express our gratitude to all of our friends, Brainycube, and the Sunway family for their assistance and support in making this project a reality.
Conclusion?

We successfully designed, developed, and tested the IoT-based Automatic Water Temperature Adjustor system. There were some updates as well in this system such as replacing I2C LCD with I2C OLED, making applications for the system, and others. The IoT-based Automatic Water Temperature Adjustor project was able to maintain the temperature of water at the preset temperature range after reading the temperature atmosphere. It triggers the LED that creates awareness when the heated water has reached its maximum preset temperature. The components used in building the system were readily available.

The IoT-based Automatic Water Temperature Adjustor system could be useful in homes, offices, factories, hotels, cafeterias, manufacturing processes, laundries, industries, thermal electric generation plants, etc. In the future, we can apply the whole system automation using Wi-Fi, make the size and weight of the system smaller, applying in other temperature-related systems, and many more.
The possibilities are endless which we will continue to explore in Sunway College’s research lab and beyond that.

I recently conducted a data analysis project on Netflix movies, and I’m excited to share some intriguing insights with you! In a world where binge-watching has become the norm, I set out to investigate whether movies on Netflix are getting shorter over time. The answer? Well, it’s not that straightforward.
🍿 Movie Duration Trends: While some movies have indeed become more concise, it’s essential to note that not all genres are following this trend.
Here’s what I discovered:
📉 Decline in Length: Genres like Children’s and Documentaries have shown a decline in movie length. It seems that audiences in these categories are favoring shorter, more focused content.
📈 Consistency: Interestingly, genres like Stand-up comedy have remained relatively consistent in their movie durations. This suggests that these genres are maintaining a stable viewing experience.

Netflix! What started in 1997 as a DVD rental service has since exploded into the largest entertainment/media company by market capitalization, boasting over 200 million subscribers as of January 2021.

Given the large number of movies and series available on the platform, it is a perfect opportunity to flex our data manipulation skills and dive into the entertainment industry. Our friend has also been brushing up on their Python skills and has taken a first crack at a CSV file containing Netflix data. For their first order of business, they have been performing some analyses, and they believe that the average duration of movies has been declining.

As evidence of this, they have provided us with the following information. For the years from 2011 to 2020, the average movie durations are 103, 101, 99, 100, 100, 95, 95, 96, 93, and 90, respectively.

If we’re going to be working with this data, we know a good place to start would be to probably start working with pandas. But first we’ll need to create a DataFrame from scratch. Let’s start by creating a Python object covered in Intermediate Python: a dictionary!

To convert our dictionary movie_dict to a pandas DataFrame, we will first need to import the library under its usual alias. We’ll also want to inspect our DataFrame to ensure it was created correctly. Let’s perform these steps now.

Alright, we now have a pandas DataFrame, the most common way to work with tabular data in Python. Now back to the task at hand. We want to follow up on our friend’s assertion that movie lengths have been decreasing over time. A great place to start will be a visualization of the data.

Given that the data is continuous, a line plot would be a good choice, with the dates represented along the x-axis and the average length in minutes along the y-axis. This will allow us to easily spot any trends in movie durations. There are many ways to visualize data in Python, but matploblib.pyplot is one of the most common packages to do so.

Note: In order for us to correctly test your plot, you will need to initalize a matplotlib.pyplot Figure object, which we have already provided in the cell below. You can continue to create your plot as you have learned in Intermediate Python.

Well, it looks like there is something to the idea that movie lengths have decreased over the past ten years! But equipped only with our friend’s aggregations, we’re limited in the further explorations we can perform. There are a few questions about this trend that we are currently unable to answer, including:

Upon asking our friend for the original CSV they used to perform their analyses, they gladly oblige and send it. We now have access to the CSV file, available at the path "datasets/netflix_data.csv". Let’s create another DataFrame, this time with all of the data. Given the length of our friend’s data, printing the whole DataFrame is probably not a good idea, so we will inspect it by printing only the first five rows.
Okay, we have our data! Now we can dive in and start looking at movie lengths.

Or can we? Looking at the first five rows of our new DataFrame, we notice a column type. Scanning the column, it’s clear there are also TV shows in the dataset! Moreover, the duration column we planned to use seems to represent different values depending on whether the row is a movie or a show (perhaps the number of minutes versus the number of seasons)?

Fortunately, a DataFrame allows us to filter data quickly, and we can select rows where type is Movie. While we’re at it, we don’t need information from all of the columns, so let’s create a new DataFrame netflix_movies containing only title, country, genre, release_year, and duration.
Let’s put our data subsetting skills to work!

Okay, now we’re getting somewhere. We’ve read in the raw data, selected rows of movies, and have limited our DataFrame to our columns of interest. Let’s try visualizing the data again to inspect the data over a longer range of time.

This time, we are no longer working with aggregates but instead with individual movies. A line plot is no longer a good choice for our data, so let’s try a scatter plot instead. We will again plot the year of release on the x-axis and the movie duration on the y-axis.

This is already much more informative than the simple plot we created when our friend first gave us some data. We can also see that, while newer movies are overrepresented on the platform, many short movies have been released in the past two decades.

Upon further inspection, something else is going on. Some of these films are under an hour long! Let’s filter our DataFrame for movies with a duration under 60 minutes and look at the genres. This might give us some insight into what is dragging down the average.

Interesting! It looks as though many of the films that are under 60 minutes fall into genres such as “Children”, “Stand-Up”, and “Documentaries”. This is a logical result, as these types of films are probably often shorter than 90 minute Hollywood blockbuster.

We could eliminate these rows from our DataFrame and plot the values again. But another interesting way to explore the effect of these genres on our data would be to plot them, but mark them with a different color.

In Python, there are many ways to do this, but one fun way might be to use a loop to generate a list of colors based on the contents of the genre column. Much as we did in Intermediate Python, we can then pass this list to our plotting function in a later step to color all non-typical genres in a different color!

Note: Although we are using the basic colors of red, blue, green, and black, matplotlib has many named colors you can use when creating plots. For more information, you can refer to the documentation here!

Lovely looping! We now have a colors list that we can pass to our scatter plot, which should allow us to visually inspect whether these genres might be responsible for the decline in the average duration of movies.

This time, we’ll also spruce up our plot with some additional axis labels and a new theme with plt.style.use(). The latter isn’t taught in Intermediate Python, but can be a fun way to add some visual flair to a basic matplotlib plot. You can find more information on customizing the style of your plot here!

Well, as we suspected, non-typical genres such as children’s movies and documentaries are all clustered around the bottom half of the plot. But we can’t know for certain until we perform additional analyses.

Congratulations, you’ve performed an exploratory analysis of some entertainment data, and there are lots of fun ways to develop your skills as a Pythonic data scientist. These include learning how to analyze data further with statistics, creating more advanced visualizations, and perhaps most importantly, learning more advanced ways of working with data in pandas. This latter skill is covered in our fantastic course Data Manipulation with pandas.
We hope you enjoyed this application of the skills learned in Intermediate Python, and wish you all the best on the rest of your journey!
-Bishesh Giri

At Sunway College Kathmandu, our IT and research club has developed a creative IoT Based Water dispenser. The Automatic Panipuri Water Dispenser senses when we place a puri below its dispenser pipe, the devices sense the object and fill the puri with a flavored panipuri drink. This gadget has been the pride of Sunway college and also a major source of attraction at different events. Let’s know more details on the devices used, the building process, and the working mechanism of this tech from our student Sabin Shrestha.
Hello, my name is Sabin Shrestha, and I’m now enrolled in the third semester at Sunway College Kathmandu, Nepal.

There are many automated devices developed and researched today utilizing IoT. IoT has already made life simpler for us in several ways. It greatly influences how we live our daily lives. However, this initiative is just another one that solicits donations. The project is an automated Panipuri water dispenser, as one would assume from the name.

An automated PaniPuri water dispenser is a gadget that delivers flavored water in specified amounts by automatically sensing the Puri without manual effort. The panipuri’s flavored water is dispensed using this technique. The system uses electronic components such as an Arduino, a breadboard, a jumper, a relay, and an adjustable IR sensor. The system works on the straightforward premise of detecting an item beneath the sensor and signaling the relay to activate the switch.
Keywords: Arduino, IoT, Relay, Adjustable IR Sensor
Not just for panipuri, this device is usable in many fields. Below are a few benefits of having an automatic water dispenser:
The device follows 5 different steps to dispense flavored water. Let’s break it down and understand.
The methodology consists of the following steps for making this project real:

Research is crucial to any project. Before starting this project, first and foremost we researched past works, designs, and projects. Other, comparable devices, such as automatic sanitizers, have been the subject of research.

In system design, we design the device considering its architecture, shape, and size. Also, We also list out the components for the system and plan the system operation and hardware requirements for the project. Additionally, we designed a 3D print.
In the software implementation process, we create Arduino code in the Arduino IDE according to the design and upload the code to Arduino for prototyping and testing.
In, Prototyping and testing phase, we test the working of the device with a small developed prototype.

After the prototype, we integrate all devices and components per design and code. The materials such as Arduino, an Adjustable IR Sensor, jumper wires, wires, a USB charger, pipe, wiring strips, 12 v chargers, stalls, etc.

In this stage, we gather data and analyze it as necessary. From our analysis, we found, that the object should be 5–6 cm away to sense by the system. And, It takes 3 seconds to get the flavor-infused water from the bucket once the thing is discovered.

In the result phase, we gather the outcome. As a consequence, we validate if the system operates as intended. Although the dispenser has to be cleaned every day while it is in use. But the good thing is, This project is working and put into action effectively.

The Automated Panipuri water dispenser is a gadget that senses the Puri and automatically fetches the flavor-infused water. This method can be handy in restaurants, cafes, hotels, etc. Moreover, the gadget has several benefits as we discussed, and is frequently used for automated dispensing in Nepal and other nations too.

According to Glassdoor, the average salary for a Data Scientist is $117,345/yr which is 168% more than the national average salary.
Source: https://data-flair.training/blogs/why-learn-data-science/

Nowadays, Data metrics are driving every business decision. Giant companies like Amazon, Apple, Google, Spotify, Facebook, Instagram, Starbucks, Netflix, etc. have been using data science from an early age. These companies are searching for manpower with an undergraduate degree in Data Science.

Bachelor in Data science degree helps you in visualizing data that is understandable for business stakeholders to build future roadmaps and trajectories. It helps to minimize business uncertainty and discover trends.
For Example:- We can predict the probability of a person winning an election through data science tools.

Data Scientists are an integral part of any organization. Data scientists are the ones who read and analyzed, and with a large amount of data, the importance for a data scientist is to read the data and make data-driven discoveries.
As a data scientist, you will be the decision-maker of the organization where you will be handling immense amounts of data.
Due to the gap between demand and supply where there are fewer data scientists and more demand in the business world, job placement will be easier if you have the necessary skill sets.
With the help of a degree in data science, you will be able to achieve those skill sets. It is also a highly rewarding career where your growth will be unpredictably tremendous.
Source: https://www.exeideas.com/2022/05/skills-to-become-a-data-scientist.html

With Bachelor’s in Data Science degree, you will be able to learn all the basic skill sets you need to ace as a data scientist. If you want to pursue Data Science as your career, then, here are four core skills, you will need, to understand Data Science properly.
Start by knowing the basics of Statistics and Probability. These are the major mathematical concepts of Data Science.

You should be able to understand descriptive statistics where the topics include mean, median, and mode, linear regression, and hypothesis testing. Probability is also a very important part of data science as it is a precondition for mastering machine learning.
There isn’t any specific programming language for Data Science. However, Python and R are popular programming languages in this field.

Moreover, Python is the most preferred language by professionals due to the libraries and modules it provides. Along with that, most data teams also prefer Java, Scala, and C++ according to their needs.
Machine Learning and Deep Learning are two separate topics and the subsets of Data Science. Learning the basics of these domains will help you understand Data Science conveniently.

Machine Learning and Deep Learning help in high-value predictions. It helps in analyzing a large amount of data, making the tasks of data scientists easier with an automated process and without any human intervention.

Data scientists love Data Visualization. Representing data in the form of charts and graphs which helps other people to understand the data and make it more profitable. It helps in discovering the trends in data and is interactive.

To learn these skill sets of Data Science in Nepal, you can learn through different short as well as long-term courses provided by Sunway College Kathmandu affiliated with Birmingham City University (BCU).
Data Science is not only about making sense of data.

In reality, it is about recognizing business issues and addressing them with analytical solutions. To gain that skill, a degree in Data Science will be helpful for your journey to becoming a successful data scientist.

If you are a fresher and just have passed +2, then you may have participated in the 7 Days Digital Marketing and Data Science Bootcamp conducted by  one of the best IT colleges in Kathmandu, Sunway College.

Sunway College had been regularly organizing Rs.30, 000 worth of courses free of cost for students and professionals. These workshops were given by industry experts having more than 10 years of experience in the Data Science and Digital Marketing field.
After completing the Data Science and Digital Marketing Bootcamp, the students were given a project to work on. Any two best projects were rewarded with Rs.10, 000 worth of cash prize.

Free 4 days session/workshop on Data Science and Artificial Intelligence as a career for +2 students is currently running. Online or physically, you can join either way, if you have not participated in it yet. You can apply for the workshop to participate in the boot camp.
Moreover, if you are thinking about pursuing an undergraduate degree in data science and artificial intelligence then you are in for a treat.

And, what makes the course even better is a 9 month paid professional placement based on the UK sandwich course layout.
Help yourself align your passion with your profession.
